subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: D. J. Durkin is as driven as the man who hired him, Jim Harbaugh. The result has been three shutouts in a row and a climb by Durkin’s squad to become one of the best defenses in the nation.
snippet: D. J. Durkin is as driven as the man who hired him, Jim Harbaugh. The result has been three shutouts in a row and a climb by Durkin’s squad to become one of the best defenses in the nation.
